column5: Take a moment in this fast pace time of the year and sit back, read and listen to this.....I know it's a USA theme but the same can be said for your true hero's serving you and I away from their families so we can enjoy ours.  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5_P6yU_ymFM&feature=share  Merry Christmas and God Bless Everyone, Bob
you made me misty BB  Merry Chhristmas to you my Americain brother and friend
I think this got lost in the snow, so lets bump it back to the top.
Thanks for that Bob, its easy to forget how good we have it in North America.  God Bless!  K.S.
Very awesome!!! Tears in my eyes....Thank you for sharing
Very nice Bob. Very over whelming.   TFS
